original_title: Sting Festival de Viña del Mar
overview: Sting, recorded live at the Vina del Mar Festival, in Vina del mar, Chile on February 25th, 2011. i has a total running time of 85 minutes, Track listing is as follows:1.If I ever lose my faith in you,2.Every little thing she does is magic,3.Englishman in New York,4.Roxanne,5.This cowboy song,6.When we dance,7.Russians,8.Fields of gold, 9.Next to you 10.They dance alone,11.King of pain,12.Every breath you take,13.Desert rose,14.She´s too good for me,15.Fragile,16.Message in a bottle (acoustic)
title: Sting Festival de Viña del Mar
